item.title: [Python] [For non-programmers] How to walk Kaggle
item.description: This article is the 3rd day of Advent Calendar from [Kaggle Advent Calendar 2019](https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2019/kaggle). “** Kaggle I’m interested, but it’s scary and scary… **” I think it will be useful for those who are thinking! *The following information is as of December 2019 Until I meet # Kaggle My background before I met Kaggle is roughly the following. Marketer â‡’ Consultant Bunka (art history major) No programming experience (I touched HTML a little) Black screen is in awe… It was like this, but I learned Python & machine learning in the last year, and I’ve managed to understand Kaggle.
